channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 10:30 Drone attack, ammunition discharges are possible
item.description: 🟠 10:30 Drone attack, ammunition discharges are possible This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
